/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, creating a corridor of urban life. A large concrete overpass arches over the street, a testament to the city's infrastructure. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The image is slightly distorted due to the fisheye lens effect, adding a unique perspective to the scene.
